TEI.2.document_title: B Q Rigg to Stephen F Austin, 02-01-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: B. Q. Rigg to Austin, Alexandria, La., February 1, 1831. Inquiring where-abouts of Robert Lewis, wanted to stand trial for debt. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 592
